solution_line_template: Mandy has a total of ${mandy_bill_denomination} x {mandy_num_bills} = $<<{mandy_bill_denomination}*{mandy_num_bills}={mandy_total_money}>>{mandy_total_money}.
Manny has a total of ${manny_bill_denomination} x {manny_num_bills} = $<<{manny_bill_denomination}*{manny_num_bills}={manny_total_money}>>{manny_total_money}.

Hence, Manny has {manny_num_ten_dollar_bills} - {mandy_num_ten_dollar_bills} = <<{manny_num_ten_dollar_bills}-{mandy_num_ten_dollar_bills}={difference_in_ten_dollar_bills}>>{difference_in_ten_dollar_bills} more $10 bills than Mandy.
